levels.description: The ground floor is designed as an art deco style residential level with a central courtyard and West-facing orientation. It includes a living area, dining room, kitchenette and guest accommodations.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.details: Spacious art deco inspired living space with vaulted ceilings and decorative elements in line with Vastu principles for energy flow. Features natural lighting from West-facing windows.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.details: Adjacent to the living room, featuring an art deco chandelier and richly upholstered seating for elegant dining experience.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.details: Compact but functional space with modern appliances. Designed to optimize workflow in alignment with Vastu by ensuring proper placement of cooking elements relative to the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Guest Room 1
rooms.details: Cozy guest accommodation with built-in storage and art deco detailing. Windows strategically placed for optimal light as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Room 2
rooms.details: Additional guest room designed with similar attention to detail and functionality, ensuring privacy and adherence to local norms.

openings.description: Main entrance leading directly into the central courtyard area. The door placement is considered in Vastu guidelines for optimal energy flow.
Large windows on the west side to harness natural sunlight and provide ventilation, respecting the West-facing plot orientation.

levels.description: The first floor is designed as a private residential level with art deco interiors. It includes three master bedrooms, a balcony adjoining each room for relaxation, and a central bathroom area.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.details: Spacious bedroom featuring art deco finishes. Includes an adjoining balcony with access to the central courtyard view.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.details: Another master bedroom designed with a mix of modern and art deco aesthetics, featuring built-in wardrobes and an adjoining balcony.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 3
rooms.details: Additional master bedroom ensuring privacy. The design incorporates Vastu principles for restful sleep with proper directional alignment.

openings.description: Separate entrance to the central bathroom area from each master bedroom, ensuring privacy and ease of access.
Windows on balconies for natural light and ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.

levels.description: The rooftop level includes a terrace area designed to serve as an outdoor living space. It offers panoramic views of the surrounding cityscape, in line with both aesthetic and practical considerations.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.details: Expansive terrace offering relaxation space with art deco decorative elements. Designed for gatherings and as an extension of the indoor living area.

openings.description: Door leading from the first floor to the terrace, ensuring seamless access while maintaining structural integrity.

levels.description: The central courtyard is an integral part of the townhouse design, serving as a natural light well and ventilation zone. It is designed following local building norms and Vastu principles for energy circulation.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.details: Open space in the middle of the building that provides ample natural light, ventilation, and a tranquil outdoor area. Features minimalistic landscaping with decorative art deco elements.

openings.description: Multiple door openings from surrounding rooms to ensure easy access to the courtyard for light and ventilation purposes.
